Wisdom: إِنَّمَا الْمَرْءُ مَجْزِيٌّ بِمَا أَسْلَفَ وَقَادِمٌ عَلَى مَا قَدَّمَ
enWisdom: Verily a person is only rewarded for what he has sent in advance and meets [only] that which he sent ahead

Wisdom: ثَوَابُ اللَّهِ لِأَهْلِ طَاعَتِهِ وَعِقَابُهُ لِأَهْلِ مَعْصِيَتِهِ
enWisdom: The reward of Allah is for those who obey Him and His punishment is for those who disobey Him

Wisdom: كُلُّ امْرِئٍ عَلَى مَا قَدَّمَ قَادِمٌ وَبِمَا عَمِلَ مَجْزِيٌّ
enWisdom: Every person is approaching that which he has sent forward and will be recompensed for his actions

Wisdom: كُلٌّ يَحْصُدُ مَا زَرَعَ وَيُجْزَى بِمَا صَنَعَ
enWisdom: Everyone reaps what he sows and is rewarded for what he does

Wisdom: كُلُّ امْرِئٍ يَلْقَى مَا عَمِلَ وَيُجْزَى بِمَا صَنَعَ
enWisdom: Every person will face that which he did and is rewarded for that which he performs
As you send forth, so you shall find [waiting for you in the Hereafter]

Wisdom: إِنَّكُمْ مُؤَاخَذُونَ بِأَقْوَالِكُمْ فَلَا تَقُولُوا إِلَّا خَيْراً
enWisdom: Verily you are accountable for your speech, so do not say anything except [that which is] good

Wisdom: الْحِسَابُ قَبْلَ الْعِقَابِ الثَّوَابُ بَعْدَ الْحِسَابِ
enWisdom: The reckoning is before the punishment and the reward is after the reckoning

Wisdom: عَجِبْتُ لِمَنْ يَعْجَزُ عَنْ دَفْعِ مَا عَرَاهُ كَيْفَ يَقَعُ لَهُ الْأَمْنُ مِمَّا يَخْشَاهُ
enWisdom: I am amazed at the one who is incapable of warding off that which comes upon him, how does he feel safe from the one whom (or the thing which) he is afraid of?!
